description: An AI-powered platform that creates personalized resume templates optimized for specific industries and job roles.
features: Customization for various industries and job roles
Content enhancements based on career goals and hiring trends
targetAudience: Job seekers looking to tailor their resumes for specific industries and roles

branding.tagline: Craft Your Future, One Resume at a Time
branding.logoDescription: Sleek, modern typeface with 'RG' intertwined, 'G' designed as a paperclip symbolizing organization and professionalism
